    • Constructor Detail

      • Trigger

        public Trigger(java.lang.String script)
        This constructor does not initialize the fields. It is essential to call init() method in order to make the Trigger work properly. If you want to create a Trigger with customized behavior, it's not necessary to call init() but need to override initInterpreter(), startInterpretation(), or activate() method as your need
        Parameters:
        script -

      • activate

        public boolean activate(org.bukkit.event.Event e,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> scriptVars)
        Start this trigger. Variables in scriptVars may be overridden if it has same name as the name of fields of Event class.
        Parameters:
        e - the Event associated with this Trigger
        scriptVars - the temporary local variables
        Returns:
        true if activated; false if on cooldown
